# GitHub Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview / Обзор проекта

This is a website project for asphalt paving services in Moscow and Moscow region, built on MODX Revolution CMS.

Это проект веб-сайта для услуг асфальтирования в Москве и Московской области, построенный на CMS MODX Revolution.

## Technology Stack / Технологический стек

- **CMS**: MODX Revolution
- **Languages**: PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS
- **Database**: MySQL
- **Frontend**: Responsive design, modern CSS/JS

## Project Goals / Цели проекта

### English
- Provide comprehensive information about asphalt paving services
- Showcase completed projects and portfolio
- Enable easy contact and quote requests
- Optimize for local SEO (Moscow and Moscow region)
- Ensure mobile responsiveness

### Русский
- Предоставлять полную информацию об услугах асфальтирования
- Демонстрировать выполненные проекты и портфолио
- Обеспечить простую связь и запросы на расчет стоимости
- Оптимизировать для локального SEO (Москва и Московская область)
- Обеспечить адаптивность для мобильных устройств

## Development Guidelines / Руководство по разработке

### Code Style
- Follow MODX Revolution best practices
- Use semantic HTML5
- Write clean, documented PHP code
- Follow PSR-12 coding standards for PHP
- Use meaningful variable and function names in English or transliterated Russian

### MODX-Specific Guidelines
- Utilize MODX chunks for reusable content blocks
- Create custom snippets for dynamic functionality
- Use templates for page layouts
- Implement proper caching strategies
- Follow MODX security best practices

### Content Focus
- All content should be in Russian language
- Focus on Moscow and Moscow region geography
- Include service descriptions for:
  - Асфальтирование дорог (Road asphalting)
  - Ремонт асфальтового покрытия (Asphalt repair)
  - Укладка асфальта (Asphalt laying)
  - Асфальтирование парковок (Parking lot asphalting)
  - Асфальтирование дворов (Courtyard asphalting)

### SEO Requirements
- Include location-based keywords (Москва, Московская область)
- Optimize meta tags and descriptions
- Implement proper heading hierarchy (H1-H6)
- Use schema markup for local business
- Ensure fast page load times

### UI/UX Considerations
- Clean, professional design
- Easy navigation structure
- Contact forms with validation
- Photo galleries for completed projects
- Call-to-action buttons prominently placed
- Mobile-first responsive design

## Common Tasks / Распространенные задачи

When working on this project, common tasks include:
- Creating/modifying MODX templates
- Adding new service pages
- Updating portfolio/project galleries
- Implementing contact forms
- Optimizing for search engines
- Ensuring cross-browser compatibility
- Testing mobile responsiveness
